com.snap2d.sound
Class SoundAPI

java.lang.Object
  com.snap2d.sound.SoundAPI

public class SoundAPI
extends Object

SoundAPI acts as an entrance point to the Snapdragon2D Sound API. You MUST call the init method before an instance of Sound2D can be obtained. Note: A shutdown hook is added to the system to ensure that sound-based resources are cleaned up properly. You may still shutdown a Sound2D instance at any time. The shutdown hook will simply abort its shutdown operation.

Author:
Brian Groenke
